_meta.description: Phosphate Processing Equipment Type Library — OCP Maintenance AI MVP
_meta.source: Industry data for phosphate beneficiation plants (OCP Group, Morocco)
_meta.fm_validation: All failure modes validated against 72-combo VALID_FM_COMBINATIONS (SRC-09)

failure_modes.what: Motor winding insulation degrades over time
Motor bearing overheats due to lubricant contamination
failure_modes.typical_task: Measure motor bearing vibration and temperature

failure_modes.what: Motor thermally overloads due to overcurrent
failure_modes.typical_task: Check motor current draw and protection relay settings

failure_modes.what: Gearbox gears wear due to metal-to-metal contact
failure_modes.typical_task: Analyze gearbox oil sample for metal particles

failure_modes.what: Gearbox seal degrades with age
Coupling element degrades with age
Coupling loses preload due to vibration
failure_modes.typical_task: Inspect coupling alignment and bolt torque

failure_modes.what: Liner wears due to impact shock loading from ore
failure_modes.typical_task: Measure liner thickness using ultrasonic testing

failure_modes.what: Liner cracks due to impact shock loading
failure_modes.typical_task: Inspect liner for cracks during shutdown

failure_modes.what: Lifter bar wears due to impact shock loading
failure_modes.typical_task: Measure lifter bar height during reline

failure_modes.what: Shell cracks due to cyclic loading
failure_modes.typical_task: Perform shell NDT inspection for fatigue cracks

failure_modes.what: Feed chute liner wears due to impact shock from ore
Trunnion bearing wears due to mechanical overload
Screen panel wears due to impact shock loading
failure_modes.typical_task: Inspect and replace worn trommel screen panels

failure_modes.what: Screen blocks due to excessive particle size
failure_modes.typical_task: Check trommel discharge for oversized material

failure_modes.what: Trunnion seal degrades with age
Lube pump wears due to lubricant contamination
failure_modes.typical_task: Check lube oil pump discharge pressure

Cooler tubes corrode in corrosive environment

Impeller wears from excessive fluid velocity
